Quests.Name: fishy_delivery
Quests.Title: Fishy Delivery
Quests.Description:
I be very hungered. Please bring me a juicy sardine.

- 5000g
Quests.ReactionText: Thank you, @! I will devour it with glee.

Quests.Name: watery_exploration
Quests.Title: Watery Exploration
Quests.Description:
I heard there's a good fishing spot near by, would you mind checking it out.

- Reward 10000g

Tasks.Name: cross_bridge
Tasks.Description: Cross the bridge to Jojo Mart

Quests.Objective: Cross the bridge to Jojo Mart
Quests.ReactionText: Thank you, @! Glad to know it truely exists.

OfferDetails.DialogueText: I haven't eaten in many days, would you be so helpful as to get me a sardine to tide the onset of death.
